songs.title: Just You
songs.lyrics:
[Pre-Chorus]
You know I wanna be the person that you could run to
Anytime, you know, you could come through
Take your time, I ain't tryna rush you
Never question you, know it's just you

[Chorus]
It's just you, yeah
It's just you, it's just you, yeah
It's just you, it's just you, uh
Oh, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Oh, yeah
Yeah

[Verse]
'Cause I be gettin' high when I'm low, yeah
These feelings, I don't show, yeah
Sometimes I don't know where to go, oh, yeah
But tell me what you need, tell me what you need
I'll do anything for you always
I know that you love all the small things
'Cause I ain't never met nobody like you
I couldn't run away if I tried to
You should hit my line, you should slide through, yeah
Baby, you should slide through, oh, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
You know I wanna be the person that you could run to
Anytime, you know, you could come through
Take your time, I ain't tryna rush you
Never question you, know it's just you

[Chorus]
It's just you, yeah
It's just you, it's just you, yeah
It's just you, it's just you, uh
Oh, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Oh, yeah
Yeah
